filmography.title: John Loves Mary
filmography.role_description: A young woman eagerly awaiting the return of her GI fiancé, unaware that he has married a British woman to help her immigrate.
filmography.plot: A returning soldier marries an English woman to get her into the U.S. for a friend, but complications arise when his actual fiancée greets him at home.

filmography.title: The Fountainhead
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, idealistic woman who engages in a complex and turbulent relationship with an uncompromising architect.
filmography.plot: An individualistic architect chooses to struggle in obscurity rather than compromise his artistic and personal vision.

filmography.title: The Hasty Heart
filmography.role_description: A compassionate nurse in a WWII mobile hospital who tries to bring friendship to a dying, bitter Scottish soldier.
filmography.plot: A group of wounded soldiers in a jungle hospital try to befriend a proud, dying Scotsman who doesn't know his prognosis.

filmography.title: Bright Leaf
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a tobacco tycoon who becomes the object of a rival's obsession and revenge.
filmography.plot: A ruthless man builds a cigarette empire to destroy the family that ruined his father, only to find his victory hollow.

filmography.title: The Breaking Point
filmography.role_description: A sultry femme fatale who tempts a financially struggling fishing boat captain into a dangerous smuggling scheme.
filmography.plot: A fishing boat captain gets involved in illegal smuggling to support his family, leading to tragic consequences.

filmography.title: Three Secrets
filmography.role_description: A tough newspaper reporter who is one of three women waiting to see if a boy who survived a plane crash is the son she gave up for adoption.
filmography.plot: Three women wait anxiously to find out if a 5-year-old boy, the sole survivor of a plane crash, is the son each gave up for adoption.

filmography.title: Operation Pacific
filmography.role_description: A Navy nurse and the ex-wife of a submarine commander who rekindles their romance during a dangerous mission.
filmography.plot: During WWII, a submarine commander tries to solve a torpedo problem while dealing with his ex-wife and a secret mission.

filmography.title: Raton Pass
filmography.role_description: A ruthless and ambitious woman who marries a rancher to gain control of his land, sparking a violent range war.
filmography.plot: A woman marries a rancher for his property and hires gunmen to hold it, leading to a battle for control of Raton Pass.

filmography.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
filmography.role_description: A widow who befriends a mysterious boarder, eventually discovering he is an alien emissary with a vital message for humanity.
filmography.plot: An alien lands on Earth and tells the people of the world that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets.

filmography.title: Week-End with Father
filmography.role_description: A widow who falls in love with a widower, leading to comedic chaos as their children try to sabotage the relationship.
filmography.plot: A widow and a widower meet and fall in love, but their children and dogs make their courtship difficult.

filmography.title: Diplomatic Courier
filmography.role_description: A wealthy American widow who becomes a person of interest to a State Department courier involved in Cold War espionage.
filmography.plot: A State Department courier travels to Trieste to pick up a valuable document but gets entangled in a web of murder and spies.

filmography.title: Washington Story
filmography.role_description: A cynical reporter assigned to write a smear piece on a congressman, only to find herself falling for his integrity.
filmography.plot: A reporter looking for dirt on a congressman ends up respecting his dedication and falling in love with him.

filmography.title: Something for the Birds
filmography.role_description: An environmental activist who goes to Washington to save the California condor and charms a professional engraver.
filmography.plot: An engraver who crashes Washington parties teams up with an environmentalist to stop a lobbyist from destroying a bird sanctuary.

filmography.title: Stranger from Venus
filmography.role_description: A woman who encounters a mysterious stranger from Venus who has come to warn humanity about the dangers of nuclear power.
filmography.plot: A stranger from Venus arrives in Britain to warn Earth about the dangers of atomic power and falls for a local woman.

filmography.title: A Face in the Crowd
filmography.role_description: A radio producer who discovers a drifter and turns him into a star, only to watch him become a power-hungry demagogue.
filmography.plot: An Arkansas drifter becomes an overnight media sensation, but his arrogance and lust for power threaten to destroy him.

filmography.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, cynical interior decorator who keeps a younger man as her lover.
filmography.plot: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

filmography.title: Hud
filmography.role_description: A weary but dignified housekeeper who resists the advances of the arrogant title character; the role earned her an Oscar.
filmography.plot: An honest rancher struggles with his unscrupulous, selfish son while their housekeeper tries to maintain her dignity.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Actress; BAFTA: Win – Best Foreign Actress

filmography.title: Psyche 59
filmography.role_description: A woman suffering from psychosomatic blindness who suspects her husband is attracted to her younger sister.
filmography.plot: A blind woman's marriage is threatened when her younger sister comes to stay, leading to a psychological family drama.

filmography.title: In Harm's Way
filmography.role_description: A compassionate Navy nurse who falls in love with a tough Admiral during the early days of World War II.
filmography.plot: A naval officer reprimanded after Pearl Harbor is given a second chance to prove himself against the Japanese.

filmography.title: The Subject Was Roses
filmography.role_description: A mother caught in a tense emotional triangle with her husband and their son who has just returned from war.
filmography.plot: A young veteran returns home to his parents, where unresolved family conflicts and resentments boil over.

filmography.title: The Homecoming: A Christmas Story
filmography.role_description: The strong, loving matriarch of a rural family waiting for her husband to return home on Christmas Eve; the pilot for 'The Waltons'.
filmography.plot: A family in the Depression-era mountains waits anxiously for their father to return home for Christmas during a snowstorm.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Best Actress (TV Drama)

filmography.title: The Night Digger
filmography.role_description: A lonely spinster caring for her domineering mother who falls for a young handyman with a dark secret.
filmography.plot: A middle-aged woman falls in love with a young handyman, unaware that he is a psychotic killer.

filmography.title: Baxter!
filmography.role_description: A speech therapist who tries to help a troubled young boy suffering from a speech impediment and emotional neglect.
filmography.plot: A young boy with a speech impediment finds solace with a speech therapist and new friends in London.

filmography.title: The Passage
filmography.role_description: The ill wife of a scientist escaping the Nazis, who must be carried across the Pyrenees to safety.
filmography.plot: A Basque shepherd is hired to lead a scientist and his family across the Pyrenees to escape the Nazis.

filmography.title: Ghost Story
filmography.role_description: The wife of one of the elderly protagonists who becomes entangled in a supernatural revenge plot.
filmography.plot: Four elderly men are haunted by the ghost of a woman they wronged decades ago.

filmography.title: Cookie's Fortune
filmography.role_description: An eccentric, elderly widow whose suicide is covered up as a murder by her nieces, sparking a town mystery.
filmography.plot: A small town is thrown into chaos when a wealthy widow's suicide is staged as a murder by her family.
